name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome State App - Save all your tabs easily

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save all the tabs in your browser with just a click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension helps save all your tabs in the active window of your browser in an executable batch script which can be launched to recover all of them. It was designed to combat the high RAM usage of chrome in low-end machines and the lack of flexibility of "Ctrl + Shift + T" key combination of recovering tabs.
